snippet: PECK--Norman. The entire New York City Center family mourns the passing of our dear friend Norman Peck. During his long and distinguished tenure as president of The Peter Jay Sharp Foundation, Norman had an indelible impact on countless cultural institutions in New York City. At City Center, his generosity supported the creation of the Fall for Dance Festival and ensured its long-term sustainability. Our deepest condolences to his beloved wife Liliane and to his entire family. He will be greatly missed. Arlene Shuler President & CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: PECK--Norman. The entire New York City Center family mourns the passing of our dear friend Norman Peck. During his long and distinguished tenure as president of The Peter Jay Sharp Foundation, Norman had an indelible impact on countless cultural institutions in New York City. At City Center, his generosity supported the creation of the Fall for Dance Festival and ensured its long-term sustainability. Our deepest condolences to his beloved wife Liliane and to his entire family. He will be greatly missed. Arlene Shuler President & CEO 1/3
